name: Sennacherib
description: Assyrian king known for his military campaigns, particularly his siege of Jerusalem. Depicted with a stern, imperious bearing, clad in ornate armor and royal robes, a symbol of Assyrian might.
attributeDescription: A long, intricately carved scepter of gold and lapis lazuli, signifying his royal authority and divine mandate to rule.
clothing: Ornate Assyrian armor with bronze scales, layered with royal robes embroidered with symbols of power and conquest. A tall, elaborate headdress adorns his head.

siege-jerusalem.name: Siege of Jerusalem
siege-jerusalem.description: Overseeing the siege of Jerusalem, displaying military power and imperial ambition.
siege-jerusalem.prompt: Standing atop a siege ramp overlooking Jerusalem - surrounded by Assyrian soldiers and siege engines, pointing towards the city with a commanding gesture, displaying arrogance and military might, with fires burning in the background.

receiving-tribute.name: Receiving Tribute
receiving-tribute.description: Enthroned, accepting tribute from conquered peoples, demonstrating Assyrian supremacy.
receiving-tribute.prompt: Seated on a grand throne adorned with lion motifs - receiving tribute from kneeling figures in foreign garb, a display of subjugation and wealth, surrounded by guards and attendants.

planning-campaign.name: Planning Campaign
planning-campaign.description: Studying war maps, strategizing his next military conquest.
planning-campaign.prompt: Leaning over a detailed map of the region spread across a table - surrounded by advisors and generals, pointing with a stylus at key locations, deep in thought and strategic planning, with torches providing dim light.

divine-omen.name: Interpreting Omens
divine-omen.description: Consulting with priests and diviners, seeking favorable omens for his campaigns.
divine-omen.prompt: Standing in a dimly lit temple chamber - consulting with priests interpreting omens from animal sacrifices or celestial events, face showing a mix of anxiety and anticipation, seeking divine guidance for his war campaigns.

assassination.name: Assassination
assassination.description: His assassination by his own sons while worshiping in the temple.
assassination.prompt: Kneeling in prayer before a statue of a god in a temple - sons standing behind him with daggers raised, face contorted in shock and pain, the moment of betrayal and death, blood splattering on the temple floor.
